member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.InsertAt
member.summary: Where to insert new pages inside an existing document.
member.remarks: This can be used with the InsertPagesAt property. To insert at a specific page, specify the 1-based page number instead.

member.summary: Insert at the beginning.

member.summary: Insert at the end.

member.summary: Ask the user where to insert.

member.summary: Insert at the default location.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions
member.summary: Options for launching a new instance of the client.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of LaunchOptions.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.ShowSplashScreen
member.summary: Display the splash screen. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.HiddenWindow
member.summary: Run the client in a hidden window. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.ServerName
member.summary: The Laserfiche server to connect to. Nonstandard ports can be specified with the format 'servername:portnum'.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.RepositoryName
member.summary: The Laserfiche repository to login to.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.UserName
member.summary: The Laserfiche user to log in as. Leave blank to use domain authentication.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.Password
member.summary: The password to use for the Laserfiche user.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.InitialFolderId
member.summary: The ID of the folder to open initially.
member.remarks: The folder tree will navigate to this folder and it will be made the root folder if makeFolderRoot is set to true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.MakeFolderRoot
member.summary: When opening a folder with the InitialFolderId parameter, make that folder the root of the folder tree. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions.Position
member.summary: The position of the main window.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions
member.summary: Options for opening a document.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new OpenOptions instance

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.OpenStyle
member.summary: Whether to open the document in the doc viewer, as an edoc, or in the metadata dialog. Default: DocumentOpenType.Default.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.PageNumber
member.summary: The page to display initially in the document viewer.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.MetadataVisibleTabs
member.summary: The metadata tabs to display.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.MetadataStartTab
member.summary: The initial metadata tab. Default: MetadataTab.Fields.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.ReadOnly
member.summary: Open the edoc in read-only mode. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.VisiblePanes
member.summary: The document viewer panes to display.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.OpenOptions.Position
member.summary: The position of the doc viewer window or metadata dialog.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LeftPane
member.summary: Which pane to display when launching a search

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LeftPane.None
member.summary: No left pane displayed.

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LeftPane.Search
member.summary: Show the search pane.

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LeftPane.FolderTree
member.summary: Show the folder tree pane.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions
member.summary: Options for performing a search.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new SearchOptions instance.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.Query
member.summary: The search query.
member.remarks: For an example search query, peform a search in the client and view the "Advanced" section of the search pane.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.NewWindow
member.summary: Open the search in a new window. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.OpenIfOneResult
member.summary: If only one document is returned, open it immediately. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.EagerlyRetrieveResults
member.summary: Retrieve the search results automatically. Default: false.
member.remarks: This is disabled by default for performance reasons.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.SearchOptions.LeftPaneDisplay
member.summary: Which pane to display when launching the search. Default: LeftPane.SearchPane

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportConflictOption
member.summary: How to act when an exported file conflicts with an existing file on disk.

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportConflictOption.Prompt
member.summary: Prompt the user.

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportConflictOption.Rename
member.summary: Automatically rename the exported file (e.g. "Document (2)").

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportConflictOption.Overwrite
member.summary: Overwrite the existing file.

member.name: F:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportConflictOption.Skip
member.summary: Skip the file.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions
member.summary: Options for exporting a document or folder.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new ExportOptions instance.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.DocumentPart
member.summary: Which portion of the document to export. Default: ExportType.Default.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.ImageFormat
member.summary: The image format to use for exported pages. Default: ImageType.Default.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.UseMultiPageFile
member.summary: When exporting multipage documents as tiff/pdf, combine into a single file. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.PageNumbers
member.summary: Which pages to export.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.DestinationPath
member.summary: The destination path.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.DoNotPrompt
member.summary: Whether to suppress the file dialog and begin the export immediately. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ExportOptions.ConflictOption
member.summary: How to deal with file conflicts. Default: ExportConflictOption.AskUser.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions
member.summary: Options for printing a document.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new PrintOptions instance.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.PrinterName
member.summary: The name of the printer to use.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.PageNumbers
member.summary: The pages (1-based) to print. If this is empty, print all pages.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.DocumentPart
member.summary: What to print (images/text/edoc). Default: PrintType.Default.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.DoNotPrompt
member.summary: Print without user interaction. Default: false.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.IncludeRedactions
member.summary: Include redactions on printed pages. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.BlackoutRedactions
member.summary: Burn redactions permanently onto printed pages. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.IncludeStickyNotes
member.summary: Include sticky notes on printed pages. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.IncludeOtherAnnotations
member.summary: Include other annotation types on printed pages. Default: true.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PrintOptions.ApplySearchHighlights
member.summary: Include search hits on printed pages. Default: true.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions
member.summary: Options for launching Laserfiche Scanning without launching the client.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new ScanOptions instance.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.ConnectionString
member.summary: The serialized connection to use for the Scanning session. This parameter overrides the server, repository, username and password parameters.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.ServerName
member.summary: The Laserfiche server to connect to.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.RepositoryName
member.summary: The Laserfiche repository to log in to.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.IsSecureConnection
member.summary: Use SSL/TLS for the repository connection.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.UserName
member.summary: The Laserfiche user to log in as.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.Password
member.summary: The password to use for the Laserfiche user.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.ScanMode
member.summary: Open Scanning in basic or standard mode. Default: ScanMode.Default.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.EntryId
member.summary: The ID of the document to scan into.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.IsDocument
member.summary: Whether the entryid parameter represents a document or a folder.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.InsertPagesAt
member.summary: Where to insert scanned pages. Specify a 1-based page number for an absolute location or a member of the InsertAt enumeration to use a relative location.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.CloseAfterStoring
member.summary: Whether Scanning should close automatically after storing the document pages.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions.WaitForExit
member.summary: Whether to block until Scanning has exited.

member.summary: Represents an error raised by the Laserfiche Client Automation types.

member.summary: Initializes a new ClientAutomationException instance.

member.summary: Initializes a new ClientAutomationException instance.
member.param: The error code.
The error message.

member.summary: Initializes a new ClientAutomationException instance.
member.param: The error code.
The error message.
The inner or source exception.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientAutomationException.GetObjectData(System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo,System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext)
member.summary: Sets the System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo with information about the exception.
member.param: The System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo that holds the serialized object data about the exception being thrown.
The System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext that contains contextual information about the source or destination.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientAutomationException.ErrorCode
member.summary: The HRESULT or Laserfiche error code.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance
member.summary: ClientInstance represents a single LF.exe process. This class is used to enumerate all open windows and connections for a particular instance.
member.remarks: Each instance of LF.exe can have multiple windows and multiple connected repositories.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.IsVisible
member.summary: Returns true if this client instance is visible.
member.returns: Whether the current window is visible.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.IsLoggedIn
member.summary: Returns a boolean indicating if the client is logged in to at least one repository.
member.returns: A boolean indicating if the client is logged in to at least one repository.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.Dispose
member.summary: Frees resources which were acquired and closes the client if there are no other connections.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.GetAllClientWindows
member.summary: Returns a list of all open client windows.
member.returns: A list of all open client windows.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.Close(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Close the Laserfiche Client process.
member.param: Allow asking the user whether they want to continue closing.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.ProcessID
member.summary: The client's process ID (PID).
member.returns: The process ID (PID) for the current client instance

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientInstance.RepositoryConnections
member.summary: Returns the list of currently connected repositories.
member.returns: The list of currently connected repositories.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager
member.summary: The main class which finds open Client instances and launches new ones.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.Dispose
member.summary: Frees resources which were acquired.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.Refresh
member.summary: Refreshes the list of client instances this ClientManager instance is aware of by querying the system for running clients.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.IsClientOpen
member.summary: Returns true if one or more instances of the client are running and visible.
member.returns: True if one or more instances of the client are running and visible.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.LogIn(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions,Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.MainWindow@)
member.summary: Log into a repository, reusing any existing client window that is already logged in as the same user.
member.param: Options specifying how to log in.
A MainWindow instance which represents the main client window, or null if there was an error.
member.returns: If a new client instance was launched, the ClientInstance that represents it is returned. If a client instance is reused, null is returned.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetAllClientInstances
member.summary: Retrieves a list of all open client instances. The returned instances must be disposed.
member.returns: The list of all open client instances.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetAllSelectedEntries
member.summary: Returns a list of every selected entry for all open client windows.
member.returns: A list of selected entry IDs.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetAllOpenDocuments
member.summary: Returns a list of every document open in the doc viewer. If a document is open more than once, its entry ID will appear once for each time it is open.
member.returns: A list of entry IDs.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetAllClientWindows(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindowType)
member.summary: Retrieve all open client windows for all open client instances.
member.param: The window type to return (main window or document viewer). Use ClientWindowType.Unknown for all windows.
member.returns: A list of all client windows matching the specified windowType.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetForegroundWindow
member.summary: Retrieve the currently focused client window, if any.
member.returns: The currently focused client window, or null if another program has the focus.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetAllRepositoryConnections
member.summary: Retrieve all repository connections for all open client instances.
member.returns: A list of all repository connections.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.LaunchClient
member.summary: Launches the Laserfiche client and connects to its automation object. The returned instance must be disposed.
member.returns: A ClientInstance which represents the new client instance. It must be disposed.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.LaunchClient(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.LaunchOptions)
member.summary: Launches the Laserfiche client and connects to its automation object
member.param: Options that control how the client will be launched.
member.returns: A ClientInstance which represents the new client instance. It must be disposed.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.LaunchScanning(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions)
member.summary: Launch Laserfiche Scanning with the specified options.
member.param: Options specifying how scanning should be launched.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientManager.GetToolbarManager(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindowType)
member.summary: Returns the toolbar manager for the specified window type.
member.param: The type of the window to manage.
member.returns: A ToolbarManager instance representing the toolbar manager.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow
member.summary: Base class for the doc viewer and main window classes.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.IsLoggedIn
member.summary: Returns true if the represented window is logged in to a repository.
member.returns: True if the represented window is logged in to a repository.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.GetWindowType
member.summary: Returns the window type for the represented window.
member.returns: A member of ClientWindowType indicating the window type.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.GetCurrentRepository
member.summary: Returns the currently connected Laserfiche repository for the represented window, or null if there is no connection.
member.returns: The currently connected Laserfiche repository for the represented window, or null if there is no connection.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.GetWindowTitle
member.summary: Returns the title of the represented window.
member.returns: The title of the represented window.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.Refresh
member.summary: Refresh the contents of the represented window.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.SetFocus
member.summary: Bring the represented client window into the foreground and sets the focus to it.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.Close
member.summary: Close the represented client window.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.Close(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Close the represented client window.
member.param: True to allow prompts, false to not prompt and force close.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.LaunchScanningFromClient(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ScanOptions)
member.summary: Launch Laserfiche Scanning with the specified options.
member.param: Options specifying how scanning should be launched.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.CloseScanning
member.summary: Ask Laserfiche Scanning to close.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.SendMessage(System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.IntPtr)
member.summary: Send a window message to the represented window.
member.param: The window message identifier.
The window message's WPARAM.
The window message's LPARAM.
member.remarks: The return value from the window procedure.
member.returns: The return code from SendMessage.

member.name: P:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ClientWindow.Hwnd
member.summary: The window handle for the represented client window.

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.DocumentViewer
member.summary: Represents an open document viewer window.

member.summary: Returns the window type for this window.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.DocumentViewer.IsReadOnly
member.summary: Returns true if the document viewer was opened in read only mode.

member.summary: Print the current document using the specified options.

member.summary: Move the document viewer to the specified page (1-based).

member.name: T:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageSet
member.summary: Represents a potentially non-contiguous set of page numbers in a single document.
member.remarks: The PageSet class can logically be considered a minimal list of non-overlapping PageRange values. Consumers of PageSet can add and remove individual page numbers or ranges from an instance, and the class takes care of maintaining a minimal covering of the set by a list of PageRange values. For example, if a consumer wants to represent the set of pages 1-10 they can add the even pages followed by the odd pages; pages 1-5 followed by 6-10; or pages 1-10 in one call. The end result will be the same: a single range of pages 1-10.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageSet.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageSet with no pages.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageSet.#ctor(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageRange)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageSet from a single PageRange value.
member.param: The range of pages that the PageSet should contain.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageSet.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageSet from a string specification of page ranges.
member.param: A string specification of page ranges.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageSet from a collection of PageRange values.
member.param: The enumerator to read PageRange values from.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of PageSet from a collection of page numbers.
member.param: A collection of page numbers to initialize the new PageSet instance from.

member.summary: Adds a range of page numbers to the set of page numbers maintained by this instance.
member.param: The range of pages to add.

member.summary: Removes all pages from this instance.

member.summary: Removes a single page number from the set.

member.summary: Removes a range of page numbers from the set.

member.returns: True if any page was removed from the set; false otherwise.

member.summary: Determines if a page number is in the set.
member.param: The page number to check for membership.
member.returns: True if this instance contains the given page number; false otherwise.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageSet.ContainsRange(Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.PageRange)
member.summary: Determines if a range of pages is covered by the set.
member.param: The range of pages to check.
member.returns: True if this instance covers the range of pages specified by ; false otherwise.

member.returns: A ToolbarButtonInfo instance which describes the button.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ToolbarManager.AddButton(System.String,Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ToolbarButtonInfo,System.Int32)
member.summary: Add a button to the toolbar.

A ToolbarButtonInfo instance that defines the button.
The index in the toolbar to insert the button.

member.name: M:Laserfiche.ClientAutomation.ToolbarManager.RemoveButton(System.String,System.Int32)
